info.name: JEP 455 - Primitive Types in Patterns, instanceof, and switch (Preview)
info.dscr: Enhances pattern matching to support primitive types; see PrimitiveTypesInPatterns.java

info.name: JEP 466 - Class-File API (Second Preview)
info.dscr: Provides an API for parsing, generating, and transforming Java class files; see ClassFileAPIDemo.java

info.name: JEP 467 - Markdown Documentation Comments
info.dscr: Enables Markdown in Javadoc comments; see MarkdownComments.java

info.name: JEP 469 - Vector API (Eighth Incubator)
info.dscr: Eighth incubator of the Vector API; see VectorAPIDemo.java

info.name: JEP 471 - Deprecate the Memory-Access Methods in sun.misc.Unsafe for Removal
info.dscr: Deprecates Unsafe memory methods; see DeprecateMemoryAccessMethods.java

info.name: JEP 473 - Stream Gatherers (Second Preview)
info.dscr: Enhances the Stream API with custom intermediate operations; see StreamGatherersDemo.java

info.name: JEP 474 - ZGC: Generational Mode by Default
info.dscr: Makes Generational ZGC the default; see GenerationalZGC23.java

info.name: JEP 477 - Implicitly Declared Classes and Instance Main Methods (Third Preview)
info.dscr: Third preview of simple Java programs; see ImplicitlyDeclaredClassesDemo.java

info.name: JEP 481 - Scoped Values (Third Preview)
info.dscr: Third preview of Scoped Values; see ScopedValuesDemo.java

info.name: JEP 482 - Flexible Constructor Bodies (Second Preview)
info.dscr: Allows more flexible constructor logic; see FlexibleConstructorBodies.java
